summary: Ken Elkin is a randy young man who is told that the world is about to end. In a race against time, there's only one goal he wants to accomplish: bedding the love of his life, who just happens to be the local pastor's daughter.
cast: Noah Taylor|Miranda Otto|Arthur Dignam|Peter Gwynne|Jack Campbell|Erick Mitsak|Loene Carmen|Alice Garner|Lucy Bell|Jeanette Cronin|Hec Macmillan|Colin Friels|Bob Maza|Bartholomew Rose|Robyn Gurney|Marie Lloyd|Julie Godfrey|Gregory Simpson|John Noble|James Robert McClelland|Bruno Baldoni|Alan Light|Norm Galton|Carmel Mullin|Nan Gow|Kenny Graham|Philip Brown|Melanie Reeson|Kirilee Trist|Luke Cross|Chris Harding|Justin Lewis|Claudia Karvan|Imogen Annesley|Evan Williams|Norman Kaye|Ron Hill|Rick Hill|Bob Ellis|Maggie Blinco|Liddy Clark|Patrick Cook|Vanessa Downing|Drew Forsythe|Jonathan Hardy|Kate Fitzpatrick|Denny Lawrence|Tony Llewellyn-Jones|Martine Monroe|Don Reid|Bernadette Robinson|Phillip Scott
title: The Nostradamus Kid
